short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn Spammy Job Proposals into Money!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever get tired of all those spammy job proposals in your LinkedIn inbox? We feel you! That's why we created HireSplit, the Chrome extension that's all about flipping the script on those endless job offers.

With HireSplit, you can easily monetize the job proposals that flood your LinkedIn. Got a job offer that doesn't fit you but know someone perfect for it? Simply refer them using HireSplit! If they land the job, you get a sweet slice of the pie as compensation. It's that simple.

Why let those messages go to waste when you can turn them into opportunities? With HireSplit, your LinkedIn inbox isn't just a place for job offers you're not interested inâ€”it's your next income stream. Start making money from those spammy job proposals today!
